head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STEPHENS, LILLIAN SKLAIRE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STEPHENS, LILLIAN SKLAIRE

block.p: STEPHENS--Lillian Sklaire, 87, of Long Island, died on June 9. A professor emeritus of education at SUNY Old Westbury and author. Widow of Bernard Stephens. Loving mother to Mitch and Beth, and a loving grandmother, sister, sister-in-law, aunt, cousin and friend. Funeral services on Friday, June 15, at 10am, Sunset Chapels, 1285 Northern Blvd., Manhasset.
